name: WAIFU WARS ONLINE
description:
WAIFU, or Weaponized AI Field Unit, was created by the special weapons defense group TAKAMI Corporation, Co. Ltd. when they developed the WAIFU4u system. TAKAMI provides Tactical Arms Kit and Advanced Mining Instruments to military institutions, facilitating generalized combat operations and interplanetary resource extraction.
Features
  • Pure Gameplay - Gameplay first design across 41+ maps
  • Action RPG - Choose from 10+ stats/skills and 1000+ weapon combinations to create your own playstyle
  • Customization - Customize a beautiful W.A.I.F.U. and choose from first or third person view
  • Dedicated Servers
Game Modes
  • Survival
  • PVP Deathmatch
  • Dungeon Crawling / Mission Mode
